groups.name: alchemy.ip
groups.description: Configuration properties for Alchemy IP Management Tool.

groups.name: alchemy.ip.async
groups.description: Async processing configuration for IP storage operations.

groups.name: alchemy.ip.table
groups.description: Database table configuration for IP address storage.

properties.name: alchemy.ip.trust-all-proxies
properties.description: Whether to trust all proxy headers for IP extraction.

properties.name: alchemy.ip.trusted-proxies
properties.description: List of trusted proxy IP addresses or CIDR ranges.

properties.name: alchemy.ip.async.enabled
properties.description: Whether async IP storage is enabled.

properties.name: alchemy.ip.async.core-pool-size
properties.description: Core thread pool size for async operations.

properties.name: alchemy.ip.async.max-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum thread pool size for async operations.

properties.name: alchemy.ip.async.queue-capacity
properties.description: Queue capacity for async task executor.

properties.name: alchemy.ip.async.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: Thread name prefix for async threads.

properties.name: alchemy.ip.table.name
properties.description: Name of the IP addresses table.

properties.name: alchemy.ip.table.auto-create
properties.description: Whether to auto-create the table if it doesn't exist.

properties.name: alchemy.ip.schema.use-hibernate-ddl
properties.description: Whether to use Hibernate DDL auto for schema management.
